message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $80 is a more reasonable price. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
